sync_all.name: Sync all native groups
sync_all.description: Force re-synchronization of all Home Assistant groups, scenes, areas, floors, and labels to native protocol groups. This will update Z-Wave multicast groups, Zigbee groups, and native scenes.

sync_entity.description: Synchronize a specific Home Assistant group, scene, area, floor, or label to its native protocol groups.
